text:
@jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden "Look, I can drink water with one hand!"
"I proved how brave I can be by walking down a long scary ramp."
"If we stop testing, there won't be any more coronavirus. I alone can save the world."

How low is the bar?
